ChangeList.Description: Removed the **source** property from the [deviceManagementConfigurationPolicyAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagementConfigurationPolicyAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **sourceId** property from the [deviceManagementConfigurationPolicyAssignment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagementConfigurationPolicyAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the `exchangeOnline` member from the **deviceManagementConfigurationTechnologies** enumeration.

Removed the **getCompliancePoliciesReportForDevice** method from the [deviceManagementReports](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagementReports?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **getCompliancePolicyDevicesReport** method from the [deviceManagementReports](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagementReports?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **getCompliancePolicyDeviceSummaryReport** method from the [deviceManagementReports](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagementReports?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
